item.description: Engine Response; INC#0968; 03:57PM; 2137 W Fargo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vqoCHf; Echo Park; A delivery van (Mercedes Sprinter) slide down the steep street and is suspended on two wheels (against a tree?). Firefighters stabilized the vehicle and there are no injuries reported. LAFD Heavy Rescue vehicle will be used to bring it back to four wheels on the ground. The 9-1-1 call was received at 3:20PM. No further details.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E20 E220 HR3 RA20 T20; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Update Cliff, Vehicle; INC#0868; 03:27PM; 9301 Conover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vIzdhb; outside city; Once the patient and the two rescuers were safely hoisted, the weather enroute to the designated trauma center deteriorated and was no longer conducive to air transport. LAFD Air Ops is landing at a nearby helispot and transferring care to the firefighters/paramedics for ground transport to the hospital. No further updates.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC12 BC14 E24 E274 E289 E89 E90 E91 EM12 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 HR3 RA74 RA89 RH114 T74 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Cliff, Vehicle; INC#0868; 02:53PM; 9301 Conover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vIzdhb; outside city; 37yo M rolled an off road vehicle, (side by side style) approximately 300' down the hillside. LAFD Air Ops lowered a firefighter/paramedic to assess the patient and is now preparing a hoist operation with follow on transport. The patient is alert, talking with the crew and considered in *serious* condition due to the mechanism of injury. The 9-1-1 call was received at 2:24pm. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC12 BC14 E24 E274 E289 E89 E90 E91 EM12 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 HR3 RA74 RH114 T74 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0551; 10:52AM; 2121 James M Wood Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3C9kkYx; Westlake; KNOCKDOWN: 46 firefighters extinguished the fire in 26 minutes with no injuries reported. The unit on the 3rd floor was under construction (pipe sweating operation) and the fire extended into the pipe alley. Firefighters opened the walls to chase down the fire and confirm the path of travel did not extend up into the attic. No further details.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E13 E15 E20 E210 E211 E220 E26 RA11 RA811 SQ21 T10 T11 T20 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0551; 10:26AM; 2121 James M Wood Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3C9kkYx; Westlake; Four story apartment building with smoke showing on arrival. Firefighters made entry and located smoke on the 3rd floor. It appears a fire started (construction) on the 3rd and extended into a wall and possibly the attic. One additional task force requested.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E13 E210 E211 RA11 RA811 SQ21 T10 T11; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Train vs Pedestrian - FATALITY ; INC#1164; 05:25PM; 12201 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FZs14M; North Hollywood; Firefighter have determined death for what appears to be an adult female victim struck by train. There are no injuries reported aboard the train. Metro link tracks are closed. The 9-1-1 call was received at 5:01Pm. All further questions are referred to LAPD Inc # 3107 , LA County Sheriff and LA County Coroner for the investigation. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E289 E89 EM14 HR3 RA39 RA81 T60 T89 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue; INC#0968; 03:22PM; 2000 N Fuller Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jCRSbr; Hollywood Hills West; Firefighters located a male hiker (age unknown) and LAFD Air Ops did a hoist operation to safely bring the patient to ground (he was approximately 200' down an embankment). He is declining transport to the hospital. The helicopter will land and transfer care to the firefighter/paramedics. The 9-1-1 call was received at 2:30PM. No further details. ; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E27 E41 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 RA41 RA827 RH114 T27 UR27; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Chemical Spill; INC#0940; 02:16PM; 7320 N Woodlake Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IcgDoT; West Hills; A small amount of mercury spilled (reported to be on the floor and wall) in one room in a medical facility. There were no persons exposed to the mercury. Out of an abundance of caution, the building is being evacuated to ensure the HVAC system does not created a hazard. There are no medical complaints at this time. The facility performs procedures and has (number unknown) patients recovering from anesthesia etc. No further details.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E287 E305 JT1 JT3 RA87 SQ87 T105 T87; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0873; 02:05PM; 7850 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G2I9SX; Van Nuys; KNOCKDOWN: 76 firefighters extinguished the fire in 36 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire destroyed the unit of origin and the extent of damage to the adjacent units is being determined. The exposed mobile home / RVs were defended from damage. LAFD Arson section is responding for the investigation. Traffic will remain heavily impacted on Balboa from Stagg to Saticoy due to hose lines and apparatus. Please continue to avoid the area. No further details.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AR25 AR33 AR7 BC10 BC14 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E100 E105 E205 E273 E287 E288 E289 E290 E89 E90 EA1 EM17 EM9 HR3 RA100 RA87 RA90 T5 T73 T87 T88 T89 T90 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0873; 01:43PM; 7850 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G2I9SX; Van Nuys; Firefighters are initiating an offensive operation. There are multiple businesses housed within the structure and firefighters are conducting an interior fire attack while the truck companies are going to the roof of the attached but not involved units. There is a mobile home park to the south (Delta side) which is exposed to the fire.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC17 CM40 CM42 E100 E105 E287 E288 E289 E290 E90 EM17 RA90 T87 T88 T89 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart
